name: Persona and Scenarios
description:
This template is meant to be used by designers and teams to capture what is known about their target personas. Color coding can be used to organize personas in various ways including by ranked priority.


I designed this to be flexible and easy to modify to meet a wide range of needs. Sections can easily be added, removed, renamed, and reorganized.


Be sure to check out my goals, strategies, and objectives artifact that goes along with this as well. You can find it here:

https://www.figma.com/community/file/887173459610618754/Goals%2C-Strategies%2C-Objectives-Document


If you want to see all this works together as a system that ties UX strategy to the tactical work in measurable ways. Have a look at my book:


From Chaos to Concept: A Team Oriented Approach to Designing World Class Products and Experiences

https://www.amazon.com/Chaos-Concept-Oriented-Designing-Experiences/dp/1119628962/ref=cm_cr_arp_d_product_top?ie=UTF8
